name: The Stragglers
description:
The Stragglers is a short, choice based, nonlinear story game made with Twine.

The story takes place in a futuristic, dystopian world where survival is not guaranteed.

The game takes about 10 minutes to finish.

Note: There is an image down below, which you can download, that shows the choices you can make and paths you can take throughout the game. Be mindful of the spoilers!
